title: Santa (com.google.santa)
description: INCOMPLETE / UN-TESTED - Santa.app - Configure settings via JSON schema in Jamf Pro

ClientMode.title: Client Mode
ClientMode.description: 1 = MONITOR, 2 = LOCKDOWN, defaults to MONITOR - Running Santa in Monitor Mode will stop any binaries matching block rules, but will not stop unknown binaries from running. This is a flexible state, allowing virtually zero user interruption but still gives protection against known blocked binaries. - Running Santa in Lockdown Mode will stop all blocked binaries and additionally will prevent all unknown binaries from running. This means that if the binary has no rules or scopes that apply, then it will be blocked.

FailClosed.title: FailClosed
FailClosed.description: If true and the ClientMode is LOCKDOWN: execution will be denied when there is an error reading or processing an executable file.

enum_titles: True - Fail Closed: Enabled - Deny execution on error
False - Fail Closed: Disabled - Allow execution ignoring errors

FileChangesRegex.title: File Changes Regex
FileChangesRegex.description: The regex of paths to log file changes. - Regexes are specified in ICU format.

AllowedPathRegex.title: Allowed Path Regex
AllowedPathRegex.description: A regex to allow if the binary, certificate, or Team ID scopes did not allow/block execution. - Regexes are specified in ICU format.

BlockedPathRegex.title: Blocked Path Regex
BlockedPathRegex.description: A regex to block if the binary, certificate, or Team ID scopes did not allow/block execution. - Regexes are specified in ICU format.

EnablePageZeroProtection.title: Enable Page Zero Protection
EnablePageZeroProtection.description: Enable __PAGEZERO protection - If this flag is set to YES, 32-bit binaries that are missing the __PAGEZERO segment will be blocked even in MONITOR mode, unless the binary is allowed by an explicit rule. - Default: YES

EnableBadSignatureProtection.title: Enable Bad Signature Protection
EnableBadSignatureProtection.description: Enable bad signature protection - If this flag is set to YES, binaries with a bad signing chain will be blocked even in MONITOR mode, unless the binary is allowed by an explicit rule.- Default: NO

EnableSysxCache.title: Enable Sysx Cache
EnableSysxCache.description: Enables a secondary cache that ensures better performance when multiple EndpointSecurity system extensions are installed. - Default: YES in 2021.8, defaults to NO in earlier versions.

enum_titles: YES - Sysx Cache Enabled - (Default versions 2021.8 and later)

AboutText.title: About Text
AboutText.description: The text to display when the user opens Santa.app. If unset, the default text will be displayed.

MoreInfoURL.title: More Info URL
MoreInfoURL.description: The URL to open when the user clicks “More Info…” when opening Santa.app. If unset, the button will not be displayed.

EventDetailURL.title: Event Detail URL
EventDetailURL.description: See the EventDetailURL documentation by clicking the 'Launch EventDetailURL Documentation' button.

EventDetailText.title: Event Detail Text
EventDetailText.description: Related to EventDetailURL property. The EventDetailText represents the text to show on the button.

UnknownBlockMessage.title: Unknown Block Message
UnknownBlockMessage.description: In Lockdown mode this is the message shown to the user when an unknown binary is blocked. If this message is not configured a reasonable default is provided.

BannedBlockMessage.title: Banned Block Message
BannedBlockMessage.description: This is the message shown to the user when a binary is blocked because of a rule if that rule doesn’t provide a custom message. If this is not configured a reasonable default is provided.

ModeNotificationMonitor.title: Mode Notification Monitor
ModeNotificationMonitor.description: The notification text to display when the client goes into Monitor mode.

ModeNotificationLockdown.title: Mode Notification Lockdown
ModeNotificationLockdown.description: The notification text to display when the client goes into Lockdown mode.

SyncBaseURL.title: Sync Base URL
SyncBaseURL.description: The base URL of the sync server.

SyncEnableCleanSyncEventUpload.title: Sync Enable Clean Sync Event Upload
SyncEnableCleanSyncEventUpload.description: If true, events will be uploaded to the sync server even if a clean sync is requested. Default: False.

enum_titles: True - Clean Sync Event Upload Enabled
False - Clean Sync Event Upload Disabled - (Default)

ClientAuthCertificateFile.title: Client Auth Certificate File
ClientAuthCertificateFile.description: If set, this contains the location of a PKCS#12 certificate to be used for sync authentication.

ClientAuthCertificatePassword.title: Client Auth Certificate Password
ClientAuthCertificatePassword.description: Contains the password for the PKCS#12 certificate.

ClientAuthCertificateCN.title: Client Auth Certificate CN
ClientAuthCertificateCN.description: If set, this is the Common Name of a certificate in the System keychain to be used for sync authentication. The corresponding private key must also be in the keychain.

ClientAuthCertificateIssuerCN.title: Client Certificate Issuer CN
ClientAuthCertificateIssuerCN.description: If set, this is the Issuer Name of a certificate in the System keychain to be used for sync authentication. The corresponding private key must also be in the keychain.

ServerAuthRootsFile.title: Server Auth Roots File
ServerAuthRootsFile.description: The same as ServerAuthRootsData, but is a path to a file on disk containing the PEM data.

MachineOwnerPlist.title: Machine Owner Plist
MachineOwnerPlist.description: The path to a plist that contains the MachineOwnerKey / value pair.

MachineOwnerKey.title: Machine Owner Key
MachineOwnerKey.description: The key to use on MachineOwnerPlist.

MachineIDPlist.title: Machine ID Plist
MachineIDPlist.description: The path to a plist that contains the MachineOwnerKey / value pair.

MachineIDKey.title: Machine ID Key
MachineIDKey.description: The key to use on MachineIDPlist.

EventLogType.title: Event Log Type
EventLogType.description: Defines how event logs are stored. Default: filelog

enum_titles: syslog: Sent to ASL or ULS
filelog: Sent to a file on disk. Use EventLogPath to specify a path. - (Default)
protobuf: (BETA): Sent to file on disk using maildir format.
null: Don’t output any event logs.

EventLogPath.title: Event Log Path
EventLogPath.description: If EventLogType is set to filelog, EventLogPath will provide the path to save logs. Defaults to /var/db/santa/santa.log. If you change this value ensure you also update com.google.santa.newsyslog.conf with the new path.

MailDirectory.title: Mail Directory
MailDirectory.description: If EventLogType is set to protobuf, MailDirectory will provide the the base directory used to save files according to the maildir format. - Default: /var/db/santa/mail

MailDirectorySizeThresholdMB.title: MailDirectorySizeThresholdMB
MailDirectorySizeThresholdMB.description: If EventLogType is set to protobuf, MailDirectorySizeThresholdMB defines the total combined size limit of all files in the mail directory. Once the threshold is met, no more events will be saved. - Default: 500.

MailDirectoryEventMaxFlushTimeSec.title: MailDirectoryEventMaxFlushTimeSec
MailDirectoryEventMaxFlushTimeSec.description: If EventLogType is set to protobuf, MailDirectoryEventMaxFlushTimeSec defines the maximum amount of time events will stay buffered in memory before being flushed to disk, regardless of whether or not MailDirectoryFileSizeThresholdKB would be exceeded. - Default: 5.

EnableMachineIDDecoration.title: Enable Machine ID Decoration
EnableMachineIDDecoration.description: If YES, this appends the MachineID to the end of each log line. - Default: NO

MetricFormat.title: Metric Format
MetricFormat.description: Format to export metrics as, supported formats are “rawjson” for a single JSON blob and “monarchjson” for a format consumable by Google’s Monarch tooling.

enum_titles: monarchjson - Consumable by Google’s Monarch tooling.

MetricURL.title: Metric URL
MetricURL.description: URL describing where monitoring metrics should be exported.

MetricExportInterval.title: Metric Export Interval
MetricExportInterval.description: Number of seconds to wait between exporting metrics. - Default: 30.

MetricExportTimeout.title: Metric Export Timeout
MetricExportTimeout.description: Number of seconds to wait before a timeout occurs when exporting metrics. - Default: 30.

MetricExtraLabels.title: Metric Extra Labels
MetricExtraLabels.description: A map of key value pairs to add to all metric root labels. (e.g. a=b,c=d) defaults to @{}). If a previously set key (e.g. host_name is set to “” then the key is remove from the metric root labels. Alternatively if a value is set for an existing key then the new value will override the old.

EnableAllEventUpload.title: All Event Upload
EnableAllEventUpload.description: If YES, the client will upload all execution events to the sync server, including those that were explicitly allowed.

DisableUnknownEventUpload.title: Disable Unknown Event Upload
DisableUnknownEventUpload.description: If YES, the client will not upload events for executions of unknown binaries allowed in monitor mode

BlockUSBMount.title: Block USB Mount
BlockUSBMount.description: If YES, blocks the abiligy to mount volumes via USB - Default: NO

bannedUSBBlockMessage.title: Banned USB Block Message
bannedUSBBlockMessage.description: This is the message shown to the user when a USB storage device's mount is denied from the BlockUSB configuration setting. If not configured, a reasonable default is provided.

remountUSBBlockMessage.title: Remount USB Block Message
remountUSBBlockMessage.description: This is the message shown to the user when a USB storage device's mount is forcibly remounted to a different set of permissions from the BlockUSB and RemountUSBMode configuration settings. If not configured, a reasonable default is provided.
